meanings.definition: The act of representing something in a dramatic manner.
meanings.sent1: The school play was a wonderful dramatization of a famous story.
meanings.sent2: The dramatization of the historical event brought tears to the audience's eyes.
meanings.sent3: The children's exaggerated dramatization of their adventure made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her retelling of the incident was a dramatic dramatization of the truth.
meanings.sent5: The movie's vivid dramatization of the novel stayed true to the original story.

meanings.definition: The process of adapting a story or event into a dramatic form.
meanings.sent1: The dramatization of the book into a play was a success.
meanings.sent2: The dramatization of the fairy tale added excitement to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The dramatization of the family picnic turned into a hilarious comedy.
meanings.sent4: His life was a constant dramatization of unexpected events.
meanings.sent5: The dramatization of the legend captivated the audience with its intensity.
